🔹 What is a protocol?

In crypto, a protocol is a system with rules and logic.
Like https://t.co/mGc8Sl4wV6 (DEX) or https://t.co/Yhzeszzu8K (lending).
It runs on smart contracts.

The token is how you use or govern it.
A protocol is the machine. Tokens are the keys.
